idea: Currently corporate offices need to search online or call various caterers or restaurants to order food as per their budget which a tedious process. They follow up for delivery of food on the event date to ensure timely delivery. They wait for invoices for reimbursement from the caterer or restaurant till end of the event. Think Foods.com makes it easy to order food online for the office for routine office lunches to offsite client meetings, from 5 to 1000 people, Think Foods.com has a solution with its web application.
name: THINK FOODS TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We’re ushering in the next normal in the food services. We make & procure ready to serve frozen food under our own private label & sell to existing food operators of all sizes & types. We have idiot proof food solutions under various categories like mithais, desserts, bakery, tikkas, breakfast to name a few.
name: ADITOF PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Trijog is India's one of the top mental well-being organization, driving positive change and pioneering the mental health landscape since 2015. We are here to solve the problem between the need and demand of mental health care, building a systematic process-driven, quality controlled superior service. 


Trijog is India's own house of therapy which is accessible to end consumers as well as organizations who are looking to provide benefits to their employees. 

Today we service over 100 orgs - some of our proud partnerships are with the likes of BMW India, Paytm group insider, GPTW, Bridgestone, Eclerx, Radio one to name a few. We have reached around 15 mil people through our campaigns and over 1 Lakh hours in therapy. Our consistent quality has been one of the drivers of growth and we avg at 4.9 session ratings.


Trijog has also been representing India at the World Federation of Mental Health (https://wmhd2021.com/template.php?file=youth-conclave-21.html). The likes of WHO, Harvard, United Nations were some of the partners to support this campaign. As per a UN report of 2021, India ranks 139 out of 149 countries in the world on the happiness index, and we strive to bring change in those statistics on a scale. 



.
name: TRIJOG - KNOW YOUR MIND PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We generate our revenue through supplying I.T products such as computers, high quality output laser Printers, Plotters/ Scanners and all its consumables in all the major sectors such as Central Government, State Government, Cooperate and even Non Cooperate.

We basically participate in all sorts I.T requirement related tenders by getting our selves registered with few of the Government tender E-portals mentioned below:-

Government E market place (GeM)

Eprocurement

Mahatenders

Maharashtra etenders

MCGM

PCMC

PMC

Cidco

MMRDA

MHADA

Vasai Virar Municipal Corporation

Mira Bhaynder Municipal Corporation

 Once we are rewarded with the particular tender we had bid against we then work on its processing and final delivery in order to clam our profit and generate revenue
name: UPBOUNCE MULTITRADING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Phool Bazaar is a concept of connecting vendors who purchase flower from the market on daily basis for their business 

Basically it’s in B2B we will connect and deliver the flower  through our services which are used for making “Phool mala” we will connect with the local vendors and we’ll fulfil the need of their particular product on affordable cost price and in time quick time frame , we will take order through phone calls and whatsapp on a prior note so we can deliver them 

We will start with one pincode in mumbai first to get what we are missing and it improve our supply chain process
name: Phool Bazaar

idea: LogXchange is a tech-enabled platform - creating the largest network of delivery & distribution across the length & breadth of India, by bringing the regional courier & logistic players together. Without investing on additional infra & resources, every player can leverage the strength & reach of other member and do business nationally. This shall help the smaller players to compete with biggies & offer deeper reach across all corners of India. This shall result in upgrading their capabilities, upscaling their operations & exponential growth of their business. This shall also challenge the dominance of handful of large players & allow the economy to flourish & generate employment & local levels.
name: Logconnect Pvt Ltd

idea: Clinexel is clinexel research organization providing clinical development, clinexel operations, medical writing, and post marketing pharmacovigilance services to pharma, biotech, and medical device companies
name: CLINEXEL LIFE SCIENCES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: AFFINITY TRANS LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED has a  very strong Worldwide Agency Network to satisfy the increasingly sophisticated needs of International trade through customized solutions and seamless, integrated information systems. Our services include Air and Ocean freight consolidation and forwarding, Customs clearance, Cargo Insurance, distribution and third party logistics(3PL), Warehousing & other value added logistics services.
name: AFFINITY TRANS LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Oneinvest is a start-up company and planning to operate mobile applications/websites that would be involved in activities auxiliary to financial intermediation.

 

These applications/websites would provide a good platform to invest in,  but would not be limited to listed equity, mutual funds, insurance, bonds, unlisted investing, and other alternate asset classes, etc.

 

In many instances these applications/ websites would provide a secure marketplace and act as facilitators between private companies/start-ups and end customer.
name: ONEINVEST ADVISORS PRIVATE LIMITED
